title: Bitcoin Breaks All-Time High to $119k Amid Treasury Demand
summary: Bitcoin surged from $108k to nearly $119k, driven by exhausted sellers and growing demand from BTC treasury companies and ETFs. The breakout suggests continued strength with minimal drawdowns expected, creating a risk-on environment for altcoins.

title: USELESS Token Leads Bonk Ecosystem Rally with 60x Gain
summary: USELESS, the leading meme on letsbonkfun platform, exploded from $5M to $300M market cap, catalyzing a broader Bonk ecosystem rally. Related tokens BONK (+75%), HOSICO ($75M peak), IKUN ($30M peak), and GP (10x) all benefited from the momentum.

title: Pumpfun Announces $600M Public Sale at $4B Valuation
summary: Pumpfun token PUMP will launch publicly at $4B FDV across multiple exchanges, raising $600M. Pre-market trading at $5.3B FDV suggests limited upside for public sale participants.

title: BANANAS31 BSC Token Manipulated from $50M to $800M
summary: BANANAS31 experienced clear manipulation on BSC, pumping from $50M to $800M market cap before crashing back to $300M. The author identifies this as an "absolute scam" enabled by Binance's platform.

title: HYPER Token Surges 600% on Upbit Listing Confusion
summary: Hyperlane (HYPER) pumped 6x in one day after Upbit listing, with trading volume exceeding Bitcoin's on the exchange. Korean traders apparently confused it with Hyperliquid, driving massive speculation.

title: Ethereum Shows Strength with MicroStrategy-Style Accumulator
summary: ETH gained 10% against BTC despite Bitcoin's breakout, reaching $3000 with SBET emerging as a "MicroStrategy for ETH" buyer. This marks a significant behavior change for ETHBTC after two years of weakness.

title: Low Float CEX Tokens and Memecoins Dominate Weekly Gains
summary: PENGU (+120%), MOG (+75%), NEIROETH (+135%), and low-float CEX tokens (OMNI, REZ, ALT, SAGA) led gains. M (Memecore) up 5x in three days despite $8B FDV, benefiting from minimal float dynamics.
